document_data.mainbody:
Dendurg Two-Axe was an ogre who laired within the ruins of Citadel Rashemar during the midâ€“14 century DR.
He was a notable member of the Warband of the Citadel and among its most powerful combatants.
The great giant served as the chief bodyguard of the durthan Chaul, the annis sorceress who took over as ruler of the citadels ruins.
